'''Notes'''

Previous report can be found at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop/Maverick/ToshibaTecraM10 

Again, everything works on this laptop out of the box, and suspend is very reliable. Surpisingly on its younger brother M10-10H suspend is bit problematic and takes about 5min to suspend. There is no web-cam on this model. It has e-sate, firewire and serial port but no HDMI. It also has standard old school PCMCI slot as well as Smart Card.
